steps.description: This is the homepage showing clean component composition. Notice how the page is just a series of component imports. Each component is self-contained with its own content and styling. You can also paste the stitches directly into any .astro file if you prefer not to use imports.

This is a **CodeStitch component** - a complete UI section with no props. The content, images, and styling are all hard-coded in this file. To customize this hero section, edit the HTML, text, and images directly here. To use a different hero design, you could create Hero2.astro with a different CodeStitch design and import that instead.

See how components are imported using the path alias **@components/** which points to src/components/. The component-per-folder structure means each component lives in its own folder: Hero/Hero.astro, Services/Services.astro, etc. This makes them easy to find and organize.
